refnamediv.refpurpose: List of characters to allow ulink URLs to be automatically hyphenated on

refsection.para: If the ulink.hyphenate parameter is not empty, then hyphenation of ulinks is turned on, and any character contained in this parameter is treated as an allowable hyphenation point. This and ulink.hyphenate work together, one is pointless without the other being set to a non-empty value
